input.parameter: SELECT @i := @i + 1 AS number, vks.street_name AS street, b.house, b.floors, b.startup_year, is_emergency, is_demolished FROM buildings b INNER JOIN v_kladr_streets vks ON b.id_street = vks.id_street LEFT JOIN (SELECT id_building, GROUP_CONCAT(premises_num) AS is_emergency FROM premises WHERE (id_building IN (SELECT id_building FROM v_buildings_emergency) OR id_premises IN (SELECT id_premises FROM v_premises_emergency)) AND (deleted <> 1) GROUP BY id_building) emergency ON b.id_building = emergency.id_building LEFT JOIN (SELECT id_building, GROUP_CONCAT(premises_num) AS is_demolished FROM premises WHERE (id_building IN (SELECT id_building FROM v_buildings_demolished) OR id_premises IN (SELECT id_premises FROM v_premises_demolished)) AND (deleted <> 1) GROUP BY id_building) demolished ON b.id_building = demolished.id_building WHERE (is_demolished IS NOT NULL OR is_emergency IS NOT NULL) AND b.deleted <> 1 AND SUBSTRING(b.id_street, 1, 13) IN ([regions])
